CustomField.description: Define the price of quote lines that appear on the renewal quote when you renew this subscription. This field overrides the result of price calculations from your accountâ€™s renewal pricing method. If renewal pricing method is Uplift, uplift will be applied to the Renewal Price.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter renewal price to override default calculation. Overrides default renewal price computation based on account's Renewal Pricing field.
CustomField.label: Renewal Price
